author: rooneg
msg: (svn_client_commit, svn_client_update): we no longer have support for
committing to or updating from xml, so there's no reason to describe
an alternate set of requirements for the revision argument in the xml

author: philip
msg: Change the pool cleanup handlers so that they do not use the pool
(do_close): Add pool parameter, and use it instead of the lock's pool.
(pool_cleanup): Pass the lock pool's parent to do_close.
(svn_wc_adm_close): Pass the lock pool to do_close.

author: brane
